page.title: 06Carlton Primary School
page.content: The present building was finished in l977, although the infant section was built in l97O. At present, the school caters for l29 children although these numbers are decreasing. The original school was built next to the Anglican church in l864, and records exist for as far back as l879. the building is now used as a youth club. The school has five years of children supervised by six teachers and one part-time teacher.The children are from five to eleven years old. There are many after-school clubs run by the staff which enhance the strong sports teams of the school. Volleyball,football,chess etc. are all played after school hours. The sschool encompasses many lessons from learning to read and write to using the school's BBC Computer.
